dict.acceptation: 性格，特征；品行；字母，符号；人物；

sent.orig: Character and the value of the constant expression is representable in the type char.
sent.trans: 在char类型中，Character和常量表达式的值是可表示的。

sent.orig: School builds character, believe it or not.
sent.trans: 学校的生活能有效地帮助我们健全自己的character--个性。

sent.orig: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-space character.
sent.trans: 前跟转义字符用于表示任意非空白字符的字符。

sent.orig: A coded character set whose character set is an alphabetic character set.
sent.trans: 一种编码字符集，它的字符集是一种字母字符集。

sent.orig: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-lower case character.
sent.trans: 前跟转义字符用于表示任意非小写字母的字符。
